No Permission: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] You don't have permission to use this command.
Invalid Time Format: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] Invalid time format. Example: 1d2h3m4s = 1 day, 2 hours, 3 min, 4 sec
Nobody Muted: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] There is nobody muted at the moment.
Player Name Not Found: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] Could not find player with name '{name}'
Player ID Not Found: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] Could not find player with ID '{id}'
Time Muted Player Chat: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] You may not chat, you are temporarily muted. Remaining time: {time}
Muted Player Chat: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] You may not chat, you are permanently muted.
Global Mute Enabled: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] Global mute was enabled. Nobody can chat while global mute is active.
Global Mute Disabled: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] Global mute was disabled. Everybody can chat again.
Global Mute Active: [<color=#00FFFF>MUTE</color>] Global mute is active, you may not chat.
